mapper.select: select distinct SI."SchoolKey",SI."SchoolName" from ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION APIN, SCHOOLINFORMATION SI where APIN."SchoolKey" = SI."SchoolKey" and "IsPublish" = 1

select distinct MI."MajorKey",MI."MajorName" from ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION APIN,MAJORINFORMATION MI where APIN."SchoolKey" = #{schoolkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND APIN."MajorKey" = MI."MajorKey" AND "IsPublish" = 1
mapper.sql: AdminssionsKey, SchoolKey, MajorKey, AdminssionsNumber, CreateTime, IsPublish, PublishTime, OfflineTime, CreateYear
mapper.insert: insert into ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION() values (#{adminssionskey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolkey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorkey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminssionsnumber, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ispublish, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishtime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{offlinetime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createyear, jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION
adminssionskey, schoolkey, majorkey, adminssionsnumber, createtime, ispublish, publishtime, offlinetime, createyear,
#{adminssionskey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolkey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorkey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminssionsnumber, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ispublish, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishtime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{offlinetime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createyear, jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION set schoolkey = #{schoolkey}, majorkey = #{majorkey}, adminssionsnumber = #{adminssionsnumber}, createtime = #{createtime}, ispublish = #{ispublish}, publishtime = #{publishtime}, offlinetime = #{offlinetime}, createyear = #{createyear} where adminssionskey = #{adminssionskey}

update ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION
schoolkey = #{schoolkey},
majorkey = #{majorkey},
adminssionsnumber = #{adminssionsnumber},
createtime = #{createtime},
ispublish = #{ispublish},
publishtime = #{publishtime},
offlinetime = #{offlinetime},
createyear = #{createyear},
where adminssionskey = #{adminssionskey}
mapper.select: SELECT ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."CreateTime", ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."CreateYear", ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."AdminssionsNumber", SCHOOLINFORMATION."SchoolName", MAJORINFORMATION."MajorName", ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."PublishTime" from ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION ,SCHOOLINFORMATION , MAJORINFORMATION WHERE SCHOOLINFORMATION."SchoolName" LIKE '%${schoolname}%' AND MAJORINFORMATION."MajorName" LIKE '%${majorname}%' AND SCHOOLINFORMATION."ProvinceName" LIKE '%${provincename}%' AND ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."MajorKey"=MAJORINFORMATION."MajorKey" AND ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."SchoolKey"=SCHOOLINFORMATION."SchoolKey" AND ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."IsPublish"=1 AND ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."CreateYear" >=trunc(sysdate,'YYYY') AND ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."CreateYear" <=add_months(trunc(sysdate,'YYYY'),12)-1 ORDER BY "CreateTime" ASC

select * from (select tmp_tb.* , rownum rn from (SELECT a."AdminssionsNumber", s."SchoolName",m."MajorName",s."ProvinceName",s."CreateTime" from ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION a,SCHOOLINFORMATION s, MAJORINFORMATION m WHERE s."SchoolName"=#{schoolname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND m."MajorName"= #{majorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and s."ProvinceName"=#{provincename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a."MajorKey"=m."MajorKey" and a."SchoolKey"=s."SchoolKey" and a."IsPublish"=1 AND a."CreateYear"=(Select Extract(year from sysdate)-1 from dual) ORDER BY "CreateTime" DESC)tmp_tb where rownum <= ${pager.endIndex}) where rn>= ${pager.startIndex}
